titles.title: Jobs Investment Act of 2014
To direct the Secretary of the Treasury to develop and submit class life recommendations for depreciable assets.
Jobs Investment Act of 2014

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Jobs Investment Act of 2014 - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to develop and report on recommendations for assigning to depreciable property a class life, classification, or recovery period that more equitably provides for capital cost recovery across all industries without any significant effect on total tax revenue.
